T06asmahsuu:5: dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ sattveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭāmarthagatiṃ niruttaragatāṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan || Msa_1.1 ||
T06asmahsuu:10: amalayā vācetiṣa........[pauryādinā] amalaiḥ padairiti yuktaiḥ sahitairiti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsuu:11: na hi vinā vācā padavyañjanairartho vibhāvayituṃ śakyata iti |
T06asmahsuu:26: ghaṭitamiva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtamiva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:28: vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti || Msa_1.2
T06asmahsuu:29: anena ślokena pañcabhirdṛṣṭāntaiḥ sa hi dharmaḥ pañcavidhamarthamadhikṛtya deśitaḥ sādhyaṃ vyutpādyaṃ cintyamacintyaṃ pariniṣpannaṃ cādhigamārthaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ bodhipakṣasvabhāvam so 'nena sūtrālaṃkāreṇa vivṛtaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti |
T06asmahsuu:31: yadā sa dharmaḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ so 'laṃkriyata ityasya codyasya parihārārthaṃ tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:32: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavaddarpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt
T06asmahsuu:33: tathā dharmaḥ sūktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthastuṣṭiṃ janayati viśiṣṭāmiha satām anena kiṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:34: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣayā prakṛtyaiva guṇavat ādarśagataṃ darśanavaśādviśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayatyevaṃ sa dharmaḥ subhāṣitaiḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthastuṣṭiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ janayati buddhimatāmatastuṣṭiviśeṣotpādanādalaṃkṛta iva bhavatīti |
T06asmahsuu:35: ataḥ paraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaistasmindharme trividhamanuśaṃsaṃ darśayatyādarotpādanārtham |
T06asmahsuu:49: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutastasyāyamanuśaṃso bhaviṣyatītyatra vipratipannāstasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyamārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:54: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛttirupalabhyate na paścāditi kathamasyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate |
T06asmahsuu:61: sa eva buddho yo 'bhisaṃbudhya evaṃ bhāṣate |
T06asmahsuu:63: mahāyānaṃ kiṃcidasti tasya bhāva[ve] siddhamidaṃ buddhavacanamato 'nyasya
T06asmahsuu:66: śrāvakayānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ na mahāyānamiti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānāmanutpādāt
T06asmahsuu:68: bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ sarvanirvikalpajñānāśrayatvena kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanam |
T06asmahsuu:71: yaduktamādāvavyākaraṇādityanābhogādetadanāgatāṃ bhagavatā na vyākṛtamiti kasyacit syādata upekṣāyā ayoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:75: tribhiḥ kāraṇairanāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopekṣā na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:76: buddhānāmayatnato jñānapravṛtteḥ pratyakṣacakṣuṣkatayā śāsanarakṣāyāśca[yāṃ ca] yatnavatvāt
T06asmahsuu:79: etadeva śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānametenaiva mahābodhiprāptiriti kasyacitsyādataḥ śrāvakayānasya mahāyānatvāyoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:84: na hi śrāvakayāne kaścitparārtha upadiṣṭaḥ śrāvakāṇāmātmano nirvidvirāgavimuktimātropāyopadeśāt
T06asmahsuu:85: na ca svārtha eva pareṣūpadiśyamānaḥ parārtho bhavitumarhati |
T06asmahsuu:87: svārthe hi paro niyujyamānaḥ svārtha eva prayujyate sa ātmana eva parinirvāṇārthaprayukto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyata iti viruddhametat |
T06asmahsuu:88: na ca śrāvakayānenaiva cirakālaṃ bodhau ghaṭamāno buddho bhavitumarhati |
T06asmahsuu:90: anupāyo hi śrāvakayānaṃ buddhatvasya na cānupāyena ciramapi prayujyamānaḥ prārthitamarthaṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsuu:95: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminnupalabhyate |
T06asmahsuu:96: viruddhameva cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānaṃ cetyanyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:98: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnameva tat || Msa_1.10 ||
T06asmahsuu:102: śrāvakayāne hyātmaparinirvāṇāyaivāśayastadarthamevopadeśastadarthameva prayogaḥ parīttaśca puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃgṛhīta upastambhaḥ, kālena cālpena tadarthaprāptiryāvattribhirapi janmabhiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:104: | tasmādanyonyavirodhād yad yānaṃ hīnaṃ hīnameva tat |
T06asmahsuu:106: buddhavacanasyedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yatsūtre 'vatarati vinaye saṃdṛśyate dharmatāṃ
T06asmahsuu:113: avataratyevedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca kleśasya[kleśaḥ?] vinayaḥ[vinaye]saṃdṛśyate
T06asmahsuu:117: na dharmatāṃ vilomayatyathaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāptaye tasmānnāsti lakṣaṇavirodhaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:121: bālāśrayo matastarkastasyāto viṣayo na tat || Msa_1.12 ||
T06asmahsuu:130: anupāyatvāt śrāvakayāne na buddhatvaṃ prāptamityuktam, atha mahāyānaṃ kathamupāyo yukta ityupāyatvayoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:132: deśanāto dvayasyāsmin sa copāyo niruttare || Msa_1.13 ||
T06asmahsuu:135: gāmbhīryadeśanayā avikalpanā, ata etasya dvayasyāsmin mahāyāne deśanā |
T06asmahsuu:136: sa copāyo niruttare jñāne, tābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ sattvānāṃ paripācanādātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāditi
T06asmahsuu:137: ye punarasmāt trasanti tadarthamasthānatrāsādīnave kāraṇatvena ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:140: strasatyasmin dharme patati mahato 'rthādgat iha || Msa_1.14 ||
T06asmahsuu:147: yena ca kāraṇena yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsuu:148: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇe tu satīti caturvidhaṃ trāsakāraṇaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:149: gotraṃ cāsya na bhavati sanmitraṃ vā avyutpannamatirvā bhavati mahāyānadharmatāyāṃ pūrvaṃ vānupacitaśubho bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:157: yathākhyānaṃ nārthādbhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃstrāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt tadanyānyā[nyasyā?]bhāvāditi tato 'nyasya mahāyānasyābhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:158: atha śrāvakayānameva mahāyānaṃ syādanyasya śrāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya vābhāvaḥ syāt |
T06asmahsuu:163: vicitraścātra saṃbhā[sā?]ramārga ākhyāyate na kevalaṃ śūnyataiva |
T06asmahsuu:166: bahumukhādabhīkṣṇaṃ cātra śūnyatā kathyate bahumiśca paryāyaisteṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu tasmādbhavitavyamatra mahatā prayojanena |
T06asmahsuu:168: yathākhyānaṃ nārthāt na cāsya yathārutamartho 'smādapi trāso na yuktaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:170: evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayādviduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:172: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo manaskārājjñānaṃ prabhavati ca tattvārthaviṣayam
T06asmahsuu:173: tato dharmaprāptiḥ prabhavati ca tasminmatirato yadā pratyātmaṃ sā kathamasati tasminvyavasitiḥ śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ityarthaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:174: yoniśo manaskārāttattvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ,
T06asmahsuu:175: tatastatphalasya dharmasya prāptiḥ, tatastasmin prāpte matirvimuktijñānaṃ
T06asmahsuu:177: evaṃ yadā pratyātmaṃ sā matirbhavati, kathamasati tasminneṣā vyavasitirniścayo bhavati naivedaṃ buddhavacanamitie |
T06asmahsuu:179: ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddhau gabhīraṃ kimatarkagamyam |
T06asmahsuu:180: kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ ca mokṣa ityetaduttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam || Msa_1.17
T06asmahsuu:182: yadi tāvadahamasya na boddhetyuttrāsapadam, tanna yuktam |
T06asmahsuu:184: gambhī[bhī?] rasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ
T06asmahsuu:188: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidāmeva mokṣo na tārkikāṇāmityuttrāsapadam, tanna yuktam |
T06asmahsuu:192: yasya hīnā cādhika[cādhi]muktiḥ, tataśca hīna eva dhātuḥ samudāgata ālayavijñānabhāvanā
T06asmahsuu:193: hīnaireva sahāyaiḥ samānādhimuktidhātukairyaḥ parivāritastasyāsminnaudāryagāmbhīryasudeśite mahāyānadharme yadyadhimuktirnāsti, ata eva siddhamutkṛṣṭamidaṃ mahāyānamiti |
T06asmahsuu:195: śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattāṃ labdhvāśrute yaḥ prakarotyavajñām |
T06asmahsuu:196: śrute vicitre sati cāprameye śiṣṭe kuto niścayameti mūḍhaḥ || Msa_1.19 ||
T06asmahsuu:197: kāmaṃ tāvadadhimuktirna syādaśrutānāṃ tu sūtrāntānāmaviśeṣeṇa pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:198: śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa satyevāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ kāraṇānniścayameti na tadbuddhavacanamiti |
T06asmahsuu:199: na hi tasya śrutādanyabdalamasti tasmādaśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:200: yadapi ca śrutaṃ tadyoniśo manasi kartavyaṃ nāyoniśa ityayoniśomanasikārādīnave ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:202: svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme
T06asmahsuu:207: dharmasya ca svākhyātatāṃ pratikṣipati tannidānaṃ cāpuṇyaprabhāvāt kṣatiṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsuu:208: dharme ca pratighātamāvaraṇaṃ ca dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmetyayamatrādīnavaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:209: ayathāvataścā[ayathārutañcā]rthamavijānato 'pi pratighāto na yukta iti pratighātāyoge ślokaḥ
T06asmahsuu:211: prāgeva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmādupekṣaiva varaṃ hyadoṣā || Msa_1.21 ||
T06asmahsuu:221: ratnāni yo hi śaraṇapragato 'tra yāne jñeyaḥ sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇa[ṇaṃ]
T06asmahsuu:236: yasmādādau duṣkara eṣa vyavasāyo duḥsādho 'sau naikasahasrairapi kalpaiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:238: etena tasya śaraṇagamanavyavasāyasya praṇidhānapratipattiviśeṣābhyāṃ yaśohetutvaṃ darśayati
T06asmahsuu:241: sarvān sattvāṃstārayituṃ yaḥ pratipanno yāne jñāne sarvagate kauśalyayuktaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:243: jñeyo dhīmāneṣa hi sarvatraga evam || Msa_2.3 ||
T06asmahsuu:249: sphurati jagadidaṃ kṛpāśayena prathayati cāpratimaṃ mahā[rya]dharmam ||
T06asmahsuu:253: na hi sā guṇavṛddhistarkeṇa prameyā na saṃkhyayā na kālenātyantikatvāt |
T06asmahsuu:261: anena gotrasyāstitvamagratvaṃ svabhāvo liṅgaṃ bheda ādīnapravo 'nuśaṃso
T06asmahsuu:273: utpāditāyāmapi ca pratyayavaśenādhimuktau pratipattibheda upalabhyate kaścinnirboḍhā bhavati kaścinneti so 'ntareṇa gotraprabhedaṃ na syāt |
T06asmahsuu:281: taddhi gotraṃ kuśalamūlānāmudagratve nimittaṃ, sarvatve, mahārthatve, akṣayatve ca |
T06asmahsuu:282: na hi śrāvakāṇāṃ tathodagrāṇi kuśalamūlāni, na ca sarvāṇi santi,
T06asmahsuu:287: prakṛtyā paripuṣṭaṃ ca āśrayaścāśritaṃ ca tat |
T06asmahsuu:292: tatpunarhetubhāvena sat phalabhāvenāsat guṇottāraṇārthena gotraṃ veditavyaṃ guṇā uttarantyasmādudbhavantīti kṛtvā |
T06asmahsuu:304: samāsena caturvidhaṃ gotraṃ niyatāniyataṃ tadeva yathākramaṃ pratyayairahāryaṃ hāryaṃ ceti
T06asmahsuu:308: bodhisattvagotre samāsena caturvidha ādīnavo yena gotrastho 'guṇeṣu
T06asmahsuu:350: atyantāparinirvāṇadharmā tu hetuhino yasya parinirvāṇagotrameva nāsti |
T06asmahsuu:352: gāmbhīryaudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktirbhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca |
T06asmahsuu:353: saṃpattiścāvasāne dvayagataparamā yadbhavatyeva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisattvaprakṛtiguṇavatastatprapuṣṭācca gotrāt || Msa_3.12 ||
T06asmahsuu:355: pratipattau cotsāhaḥ [cākhedaḥ] saṃpattiścāvasāne mahābodhirdvayagatāyāḥ (MSA_Bagchi 14) saṃpatteḥ paramā, tatprakṛtyā guṇavataḥ paripuṣṭasya ca bodhisattvagotrasya māhātmyaṃ veditavyam dvayagatā iti dvaye laukikāḥ śrāvakāśca |
T06asmahsuu:374: iti triguṇā dvayālambanā ca catenā cittotpāda ityucyate |
T06asmahsuu:393: kiṃmūla eṣa catuvirdho bodhisattvānāṃ cittotpādaḥ kimāśayaḥ kimadhimokṣaḥ kimālambanaḥ kiṃyānaḥ kiṃpratiṣṭhaḥ kimādīnavaḥ kimanuśaṃsaḥ kiṃniryāṇaḥ (MSA_Bagchi 16) kiṃparyavasāna iti |
T06asmahsuu:410: yo hi parākhyānāccittotpādaḥ paravijñāpanātsa ucyate samādānasāṃketikaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:414: śrutabalādvā tatra tatra dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bahūnāṃ bodhicittotpādāt |
T06asmahsuu:421: dharmeṣu ca sattveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve |
T06asmahsuu:424: kauśalyaṃ pariśiṣṭe niryāṇaṃ caiva vijñeyam || Msa_4.10 ||
T06asmahsuu:426: dhyānamaye sukhagarbhe karuṇā saṃvardhikā dhātrī || Msa_4.11 ||
T06asmahsuu:439: sattvakṛtyeṣu samacittatā ātmana iva teṣāṃ duḥkhakṣayākāṅkṣaṇāt |
T06asmahsuu:442: janma audāryamutsāha āśayaśuddhiḥ pariśiṣṭakauśalyaṃ niryāṇaṃ ca |
T06asmahsuu:463: tasmāttathā guṇāḍhyaṃ cittaṃ muditaiḥ samutpādyam || Msa_4.20 ||
T06asmahsuu:493: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tatsukham ||
T06asmahsuu:494: tena cittotpādena varjitāḥ sattvāścaturvidhaṃ sukhaṃ na labhante yadbodhisattvānāṃ parārthacintanātsukham
T06asmahsuu:500: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluśca vivardhana[yan] dvayam ||
T06asmahsuu:501: tasya cittavarasya sahodayābdodhisattvasya susaṃvṛtaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyanantasattvādhiṣṭhānād duṣkṛtādato 'sya durgatito bhayaṃ na bhavati
T06asmahsuu:502: | sa ca dvayaṃ vardhayan śubhaṃ ca karma-kṛpāṃ ca nityaṃ ca śubhī bhavati kṛpāluśca tena sadā modate |
T06asmahsuu:508: paropaghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravartsyati ||
T06asmahsuu:509: asya piṇḍārtho yasya para eva priyataro nātmā parārthaṃ svaśarīrajīvite nirapekṣatvāt |
T06asmahsuu:510: sa kathamātmārthaṃ paropaghātena duṣkṛte karmaṇi pravartsyatīti |
T06asmahsuu:513: kleśācca duḥkhācca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle || Msa_4.24
T06asmahsuu:514: svakā guṇāḥ sattvahitācca modaḥ saṃcintyajanmarddhivikurvitaṃ ca |
T06asmahsuu:516: māyopamasarvadharmekṣaṇātsa bodhisattvaḥ saṃpattikāle kleśebhyo na vibheti
T06asmahsuu:529: api ca yasya parārthamudyogavataḥ karuṇātmakatvādavīcirapi ramyaḥ sa kathaṃ parārthanimittairduḥkhotpādairbhave punastrāsamāpatsyate |
T06asmahsuu:534: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā ||
T06asmahsuu:535: yasya mahākaruṇācāryeṇa nityoṣitaḥ ātmā paraduḥkhaiśca duḥkhitaṃ cetastasyotpanne parārthaṃ karaṇīye yadi paraiḥ kalyāṇamitraiḥ samādāpanā kartavyā bhavati atilajjanā |
T06asmahsuu:539: śirasi mahāntaṃ sattvabhāraṃ vinidhāya bodhisattvaḥ śithilaṃ parākramamāṇo na śobhate |
T06asmahsuu:540: śataguṇaṃ hi sa vīryaṃ kartumarhati śrāvakavīryāt tathā hi svaparabandhanairvividhairatyarthaṃ baddhaḥ kleśakarmajanmasvabhāvaiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:556: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvādhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe
T06asmahsuu:557: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarāmiṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisattvasya kaḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā |
T06asmahsuu:560: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau |
T06asmahsuu:561: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate ||
T06asmahsuu:562: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tatsādhayati parārthamātmano 'tyarthaṃ
T06asmahsuu:568: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:570: trividhe sattvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrastheḥ trayodaśavidho bodhisattvasya parārthaḥ
T06asmahsuu:581: saha tathāgatajñānenetyeṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisattvasya
T06asmahsuu:584: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragākṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā || Msa_5.6
T06asmahsuu:585: yathāsau parārthapatipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsuu:596: | na hyadūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:600: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:601: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:602: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām |
T06asmahsuu:603: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim ||
T06asmahsuu:605: | calaṃ viparyāsasukhaṃ rūpārūpyabhavapriyāṇāmanityatvātparamārthaduḥkhatvācca saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ādhayaḥ kleśā veditavyā duḥkhādhānāt |
T06asmahsuu:606: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkhamevāpnoti |
T06asmahsuu:607: bodhisattvastu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnotyayamasyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:610: yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:612: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisattvaḥ pravartate
T06asmahsuu:613: | īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānastena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanairhitārthaṃ sattveṣu tatsarvamabhisaṃskaroti |
T06asmahsuu:617: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ || Msa_5.10 ||
T06asmahsuu:618: sadā kleśairasvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣamupaiti bodhisattvaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:625: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhāmabhibhūyagamanāt |
T06asmahsuu:627: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ, rūpaṃ cetsubhūta[te] bhāvo 'bhaviṣyannābhāvo nedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokamabhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsuu:634: na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cā[nā]vahīyate |
T06asmahsuu:635: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam ||
T06asmahsuu:642: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayornirodhotpāde tad[thā]vasthatvāt |
T06asmahsuu:643: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt |
T06asmahsuu:646: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā |
T06asmahsuu:647: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:654: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyamātmadṛṣṭistasmādeva cātmābhāvonmokṣo 'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyaḥ, na tu kaścinmuktaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:656: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātrāmāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām |
T06asmahsuu:657: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ || Msa_6.3
T06asmahsuu:660: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātramātmadarśanaṃ niḥśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati |
T06asmahsuu:666: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti |
T06asmahsuu:667: tatkathametāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannamiti |
T06asmahsuu:671: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānamadraṣṭuṃ syānna tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭhumiti |
T06asmahsuu:673: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha |
T06asmahsuu:674: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām || Msa_6.5
T06asmahsuu:675: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcinnānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā |
T06asmahsuu:676: tathāpi janmakṣayānmokṣaprāptirbhavatyeva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti |
T06asmahsuu:679: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:681: arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre |
T06asmahsuu:683: nāstīti cittātparametya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvamupaiti tasmāt |
T06asmahsuu:686: tadāśrayo gahvaradoṣasaṃcayo mahāgadeneva viṣaṃ nirasyate || Msa_6.9 ||
T06asmahsuu:691: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthānviditvā tadābhāse cittamātre 'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisattvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā |
T06asmahsuu:692: tataḥ pareṇa dharmadhātoḥ pratyakṣato['va?] gamane dvayalakṣaṇena viyukto
T06asmahsuu:695: tṛtīyena yathāsau dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatāmeti tad darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:697: cittādanyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstītyavagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhya[ā]bhāve grāhakābhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:698: dvaye cāsya [dvayasyāsya?] nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātāvavasthānamatadgatirgrāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahitaṃ evaṃ
T06asmahsuu:701: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūrānupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt paramārthajñānamāhātmye ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:704: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matimupanividhāya yā smṛtirūpalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ kalpanāmātrāmavagacchatyevaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃbuddhatvamāśu vrajatītyetatparamārthajñānasya māhātmyam |
T06asmahsuu:710: jñānaṃ hi sarvatragasaprabhedeṣvavyāhataṃ dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ || Msa_7.1
T06asmahsuu:712: vāci jñānaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñāyāṃ[yayā] vācaṃ tatra gatvopapannā bhāṣante |
T06asmahsuu:716: niḥsaraṇe jñānamāsravakṣayābhijñā, yathā sattvā upapattito niḥsarantīti |
T06asmahsuu:717: eṣu ṣaṭsvartheṣu sarvatra laukadhātau saprabhedeṣu padāparokṣamavyāhataṃ jñānaṃ sa prabhāvo bodhisattvānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñāsaṃgṛhītaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:722: yena niśrayeṇa yena jñānena yena manasikāreṇa tasya prabhāvasya samudāgamastatsaṃdarśayati
T06asmahsuu:725: buddhāṃśca satvāṃśca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayatyānayate viśuddhim ||
T06asmahsuu:727: ātmana āryādisukhavihāramatulyaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ ca lokadhātvantareṣu gatvā buddhānāṃ pūjanaṃ sattvānāṃ viśodhanaṃ ca |
T06asmahsuu:731: saṃdarśayatyeva ca tānyatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrairapi sa prakāraiḥ || Msa_7.4
T06asmahsuu:733: svayaṃ ca sarvalokadhātūnāṃ sasattvānāṃ savivartasaṃvartānāṃ māyopamatvadarśanāt |
T06asmahsuu:747: aprameyasamādhivikrīḍitasaṃdarśanāt buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalamadhye trividhena nirmāṇena sadā sattvārthakaraṇācca
T06asmahsuu:756: sattvapariśodhanayā ca buddhanāmavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhanāmasaṃśrāvaṇayā prasādaṃ grāhayitvā tadavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapādanāt |
T06asmahsuu:759: śakto bhavatyeva ca sattvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakuniryathaiva |
T06asmahsuu:764: ṣaḍdhāpyabhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣābhibhuvastathāṣṭau |
T06asmahsuu:765: daśāpi kṛtsnāyatanānyameyāḥ samādhayo dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ || Msa_7.9 ||
T06asmahsuu:768: evaṃ ṣaḍarthena vibhāgalakṣaṇena prabhāvaṃ darśayitvā tanmāhātmyodbhāvanārthaṃ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:769: sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhirjagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam |
T06asmahsuu:772: vaśitāmāhātmyaṃ svayaṃ paramajñānavaśitvaprāptyā kleśāsvavaśasya jagataḥ svavaśe sthāpanāt
T06asmahsuu:779: rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvameva ca |
T06asmahsuu:780: ahāryatāṅgaiḥ samupetatā bhṛśaṃ jinātmaje tatparipākalakṣaṇam || Msa_8.1
T06asmahsuu:785: eṣa samāsena bodhisattvānāṃ navaprakāra ātmaparipāko veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:800: jīnātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam || Msa_8.3
T06asmahsuu:803: guṇajñatā ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgata iti vistareṇa kāraṇam |
T06asmahsuu:815: kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam |
T06asmahsuu:817: svaprakṛtyā ca gotreṇa paraduḥkhadarśanena nihīnayānaparivarjanatayā ca paripacyata itikāraṇam
T06asmahsuu:823: dhṛtiḥ sahanaṃ kṣāntiriti paryāyāḥ tatatparipāke gotraṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ bhāvanā ca kāraṇam
T06asmahsuu:829: smṛtermahābuddhyudaye ca yogyatā sumedhatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam || Msa_8.7
T06asmahsuu:836: tatra puṇyajñānadvayena tasya puṇyajñānadvayasya bījapuṣṭatā tatparipāke kāraṇam |
T06asmahsuu:841: punaḥ sadā māranirantarāyatā ahāryatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam || Msa_8.9 ||
T06asmahsuu:843: māranirantarāyatā svabhāvo yadā māro na punaḥ śankotyantarāyaṃ kartum |
T06asmahsuu:847: jinātmaje hyaṅgasamanvaye punarmataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam || Msa_8.10
T06asmahsuu:860: vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā |
T06asmahsuu:872: supācanā[cā]pyadhipācanā matā nipācanotpācananā ca dehiṣu || Msa_8.13 ||
T06asmahsuu:887: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣvapi suvyavasthitāḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:888: tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane |
T06asmahsuu:889: yathā kṛpātmā parasattvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanānmataḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:893: ātmavatsalastu loka ātmānaṃ hite ca sukhe ca saṃniyojayati |
T06asmahsuu:894: avaśiṣṭaiḥ ślokairyena prayogeṇa sattvānparipācayati taṃ pāramitā pratipattyā saṃdarśayati
T06asmahsuu:895: yādṛśena dānena yathā sattvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:896: na bodhisattvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣvadeyaṃ punarasti sarvathā |
T06asmahsuu:897: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samairdānaguṇairna tṛpyate || Msa_8.16
T06asmahsuu:903: yādṛśena śīlena yathā satvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:917: yādṛśyā kṣāntyā yathā sattvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:925: yādṛśena vīryeṇa yathā sattvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:926: punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:932: yādṛśena dhyānena yathā sattvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:934: nihatya sarvāmavamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:935: prāptānuttaravaśitvena dhyānena nirāmiṣeṇa ca nihatasarvāvamānābhilāṣeṇa paripācayati |
T06asmahsuu:938: yādṛśyā prajñayā yathā sattvānparipācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:939: sa tattvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti sattvānsuvinīta saṃśayān |
T06asmahsuu:940: tataśca te tajjinaśāsanādarād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:941: sa bodhisattvastattvārthanaye cābhiprāyārthanaye ca suviniścitayā prajñayā paripācayati |
T06asmahsuu:945: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagadakhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisattvaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:947: anena yatra ca vinayati, sugatigamane yānatraye vā |
T06asmahsuu:953: yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ, tatparidīpanāt samāsena paripākamāhātmyaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:954: tatra tanuḥ prakāro 'dhimukticaryābhūmau bodhisattvasya paramo 'ṣṭāmyādiṣu vimadhyamaḥ saptasu veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:965: kṛtvā duṣkaramadbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaṃśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt |
T06asmahsuu:966: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānāmiva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhāti[ṭi?]tā samudāgamataḥ svabhāvata aupamyataśca buddhatvamudbhāvitam |
T06asmahsuu:967: yāvadbhirduṣkaraśatairyāvadbhiḥ kuśalasaṃbhārairyāvatā kālena yāvataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇasya prahāṇātsamudāgacchati, ayaṃ samudāgamaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:971: sarvadharmāśca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva ca kaścana |
T06asmahsuu:972: śukladharmamayaṃ tacca na ca taistannirūpyate || Msa_9.4 ||
T06asmahsuu:983: buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditamatha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūterdharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmatnākarābham |
T06asmahsuu:984: bhūtānāṃ śuklasasyaprasavasumahato hetuto meghabhūtaṃ dānāddharmāmbuvarṣapratatasuvihitasyākṣayasya prajāsu || Msa_9.6 ||
T06asmahsuu:987: sumahataḥ pratatasya dharmaratnasya prodbhūtenimittatvādratnākarābham, bhūtānāṃ mahataḥ śuklasasyaprasavahetutvānmeghabhūtam |
T06asmahsuu:988: mahataḥ suvihitasyākṣayasya dharmāmbuvarṣasya dānāt prajāsvityayamatra padavigraho veditavyaḥ
T06asmahsuu:996: tatra sarvopadravaparitrāṇatvaṃ yad buddhānubhāvena andhāścakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante, badhirāḥ śrotaṃ, vikṣiptacittāḥ svasthacittamītayaḥ śāmyantītyevamādi |
T06asmahsuu:1004: anena tṛtīyena tasyaiva śaraṇatvasyānupamaśreṣṭhasya cānuttaryaṃ tenaivārthena darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:1005: bauddhairdharmairyacca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yatsaddharme vetti ca sattvānpravinetum |
T06asmahsuu:1006: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭhamihatyaṃ[heṣṭaṃ]
T06asmahsuu:1008: anena caturthena yaiḥ kāraṇaistattathānuttaraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati tatsaṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsuu:1009: bauddhairdharmairbalavaiśāradyādibhiḥ susaṃpūrṇasvabhāvatvāt svārthaniṣṭhāmadhikṛtya saddharmasattvavinayopāyajñānāt karuṇāpāragamanācca parārthaniṣṭhāmadhikṛtya |
T06asmahsuu:1013: anena pañcamena ślokena yāvantaṃ kālaṃ yāvatāṃ sattvānāṃ yatrārthe śaraṇaṃ bhavati tatsamāsena darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:1016: kleśajñeyavṛttīnāṃ satatamanugataṃ bījamutkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminnastaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1026: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghā[bhavā]bhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā ||
T06asmahsuu:1028: tatstho hi mahācalendrastha iva dūrāntaranikṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ paśyati |
T06asmahsuu:1029: dṛṣṭvā ca karūṇāyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānapi prāgeva tadanyān |
T06asmahsuu:1031: samāviśiṣṭā api sarvagātmikā tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiriṣyate || Msa_9.14 ||
T06asmahsuu:1033: sā hi tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiḥ parārthavṛttiriti pravṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1045: yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tatsarvagataṃ sadāmatam |
T06asmahsuu:1046: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tatsattvagaṇeṣu sarvagam ||
T06asmahsuu:1048: anena caturthena tatsvabhāvasya buddhatvasya sarvagatatvaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:1050: sattvagaṇeṣu sarvagatatvaṃ buddhatvasyātmatvena sarvasattvopagamane pariniṣpattito veditavyam
T06asmahsuu:1052: tathā duṣṭeṣu sattveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate || Msa_9.16 ||
T06asmahsuu:1053: anena pañcamena sarvagatatve 'pyabhājanabhūteṣu sattveṣu abuddhabimbadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādhayati
T06asmahsuu:1060: tathā jine vinābhogaṃ deśanāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ || Msa_9.18 ||
T06asmahsuu:1073: naśuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā || Msa_9.22 ||
T06asmahsuu:1079: tatra cānāsrave dhātau buddhānāṃ paramātmā nirdiśyate |
T06asmahsuu:1082: agraṃ nairātmyaṃ viśuddhā tathatā sā ca buddhānāmātmā svabhāvārthena tasyāṃ viśuddhāyāmagraṃ nairātmyamātmānaṃ buddhā labhante śuddham |
T06asmahsuu:1083: ataḥ śuddhātmalābhitvāt buddhā ātmamāhātmyaṃ prāptā ityanenābhisaṃdhinā buddhānāmanāsrave dhātau paramātmā vyavasthāpyate |
T06asmahsuu:1084: na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate |
T06asmahsuu:1086: tenaiva kāraṇena buddhatvaṃ na bhāva ucyate |
T06asmahsuu:1089: ato buddhasya bhāvābhāvapraśne, bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavatītyevamādiravyākṛtanayomataḥ
T06asmahsuu:1091: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate || Msa_9.25 ||
T06asmahsuu:1092: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntirdarśane ca timirameta[?]sya śāntirna bhāvo dāhatimirayorabhāvalakṣaṇāt
T06asmahsuu:1094: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntirna bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāccetaḥ prajñāvimuktyā nābhāvastena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:1095: buddhānāmamale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca |

T06asmahsuu:1734: sadasanto 'tha māyābhā ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇāḥ || Msa_11.27 ||
T06asmahsuu:1735: ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇā vipakṣasvabhāvāste sadasanto māyopamāśca |

T06asmahsuu:1752: ye prātipakṣikā dharmāste māyārājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśaprahāṇe vyavadānādhipattyāt |
T06asmahsuu:1754: atastaiḥ prātipakṣikaiḥ saṃkleśaparājayo māyā [?] rājñeva rājñaḥ parājayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1758: ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaśca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaśca trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhairvibuddhottamaiḥ || Msa_11.30
T06asmahsuu:1759: yattūktaṃ bhagavatā māyopamā dharmā yāvannirmāṇopamā iti |
T06asmahsuu:1763: marīcikopamau dvau dharmau cittaṃ caitasikāśca bhrāntikaratvāt |
T06asmahsuu:1771: abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca |
T06asmahsuu:1772: na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate || Msa_11.31 ||
T06asmahsuu:1773: abhūtakalpo yo na lokottarajñānānukūlaḥ kalpaḥ, na bhūto nābhūto
T06asmahsuu:1776: | na kalpo nāpi cākalpo lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ jñānam |
T06asmahsuu:1783: sahāvidyayā kleśaiśca vṛttireṣāṃ ta ime sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1787: ta eva hyadvayābhāsā vartante carmakāṇḍavat || Msa_11.33 ||
T06asmahsuu:1789: svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhāturvikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāccetasaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1791: bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya |
T06asmahsuu:1793: yathā hi svaratvāpagamāttadeva carma mṛdu bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:1795: evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥ prajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva vikalpā na punardvayābhāsāḥ pravartante |
T06asmahsuu:1800: śraddhādyābhāsaṃ na tadanyo dharmaḥ kliṣṭakuśalo 'sti || Msa_11.34 ||
T06asmahsuu:1805: na tu tadābhāsādanyaḥ kliṣṭo dharmo 'sti rāgādilakṣaṇaḥ kuśalo vā
T06asmahsuu:1809: tathābhāsobhāvābhāvo na tu dharmāṇāṃ mataḥ || Msa_11.35 ||
T06asmahsuu:1815: na tu dharmāṇāṃ [kliṣṭānāṃ?] kuśalānāṃ [vā?] tatpratibhāsavyatirekeṇa tallakṣaṇābhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:1818: lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ |

T06asmahsuu:1833: tasyā yadālambanaṃ tannimittamevaṃ [va] yacca parikalpyate yataśca kāraṇādvāsana[nā]tastadubhayaṃ
T06asmahsuu:1835: yathā nāmārthamarthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā |
T06asmahsuu:1838: aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaśca yathānāmārthamarthasya nāmnaśca prakhyānatā yathā nāmārthaprakhyānatā
T06asmahsuu:1839: yadi yathā nāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ityetadabhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvaddhi parikalpyate yaduta nāma vā artho veti |
T06asmahsuu:1854: pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ punastathatā sā hyabhāvatā ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ parikalpitānā [nāṃ?] bhāvatā ca tadabhāvatvena bhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:1858: etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ
T06asmahsuu:1861: cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ ca sadasattārthapaśyanā || Msa_11.42 ||
T06asmahsuu:1864: | tatrādhāro niṣpa[ṣya]ndadharmo yo buddhenādhigamo deśitaḥ sa tasyādhigamasya niṣpa[ṣya]ndaḥ
T06asmahsuu:1866: ādarśaḥ cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ samādhiryadetatpūrvaṃ nāmni sthānamuktam |
T06asmahsuu:1867: ālokaḥ sadasattvenārthadarśanaṃ lokottarā prajñā, tathā[tayā] sacca sato yathābhūtaṃ paśyatyasaccāsataḥ
T06asmahsuu:1881: na ca tasyonatvaṃ saṃkleśapakṣanirodhe nādhikatvaṃ vyavadānapakṣotpāda ityeṣā pañcavidhā yogabhūmirlakṣaṇā
T06asmahsuu:1882: tayā hi tallakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca lakṣyate |
T06asmahsuu:1890: vikalpasyāvikalpe hi kṣetre jñāne 'tha karmaṇi || Msa_11.45 ||
T06asmahsuu:1892: caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramamavikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇośca |
T06asmahsuu:1899: tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāvekai[vai]kā vaśitā sādhumatyāṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt |
T06asmahsuu:1901: viditvā nairātmyaṃ dvividhamiha dhīmānbhavagataṃ samaṃ tacca jñātvā praviśati sa tattvaṃ grahaṇataḥ
T06asmahsuu:1902: tatastatra sthānānmanasa iha na khyāti tadapi tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya vigamaḥ aparo vimuktiparyāyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1904: dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ viditvā bhavatrayagataṃ bodhisattvaḥ samaṃ tacca jñātvā dvividhanairātmyaṃ
T06asmahsuu:1907: tatastatra tattvavijñaptimātrasthānānmanasastadapi tattvaṃ na khyāti vijñaptimātram |
T06asmahsuu:1908: tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya yo vigamaḥ pudgaladharmayoranupalambhāt |
T06asmahsuu:1910: paśyati hi nāmamātraṃ tatpaśyaṃstacca naiva paśyati bhūyaḥ || Msa_11.48 ||
T06asmahsuu:1911: apara[raḥ]paryāyaḥ ādhāra iti śrutau saṃbhārāditi saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya pūrvasaṃbhāralābhāt
T06asmahsuu:1913: paśyati hi nāmamātramiti vijñaptimātraṃ nāma arūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhā iti kṛtvā tatpaśyaṃstadapi bhūyo naiva paśyatyarthābhāve tadvijñaptyadarśanādityayamanupalambho vimuktiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1919: nivṛttistu tadadhyātmasthiteriti tasya cittasya citta evāvasthānādālambanānupalambhataḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1930: yathā bālānāṃ svabhāvagrāho nityasukhaśucyātto[tmā] vānyena vā parikalpitalakṣaṇena tathāsau svabhāvo nāsti tasmādapi niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ
T06asmahsuu:1937: yo 'nutpannaḥ so 'nirūddhaḥ, yo 'nirūddhaḥ sa ādiśāntaḥ ya ādiśāntaḥ sa prakṛtiparinirvṛta
T06asmahsuu:1946: tattve 'nyatve ca pūrvapaścimānāṃ, na hi saṃsāre teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmutpattiḥ, ye pūrvamutpannāstadbhāvenānutpatteḥ
T06asmahsuu:1948: svalakṣaṇe parikalpitasya svabhāvasya, na hi tasya kadācidutpattiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1951: saṃkleśe prahīṇe, na hi kṣayajñānalābhinaḥ saṃkleśasyotpattiṃ punaḥ paśyanti |
T06asmahsuu:1952: viśeṣe buddhadharmakāyānām, na hi teṣāṃ viśeṣotpattirasti |
T06asmahsuu:1963: aniyataśrāvakagotrāṇāṃ mahāyānena niryāṇāt yānti tena yānamiti kṛtvā |
T06asmahsuu:1969: 'haṃ śrāvakayānena parinirvṛta iti vineyānāmarthe tathā nirmāṇasaṃdarśanāt
T06asmahsuu:1970: | paryantādapyekayānatā yataḥ pareṇa yātavyaṃ nāsti tadyānamiti kṛtvā |
T06asmahsuu:1971: buddhatvamekayānam, evaṃ tatratatra sūtre tena tanābhiprāyeṇaikayānatā veditavyā, na tu yānatrayaṃ nāsti |
T06asmahsuu:1982: dṛṣṭārthayānaśca yo dṛṣṭasatyo mahāyānena niryāti, adṛṣṭārthayānaśca yo na dṛṣṭasatyo mahāyānena
T06asmahsuu:1988: tau ca dṛṣṭārthau labdhasyāryamārgasya bhaveṣu pariṇāmanāt acintyapariṇāmikyā upapattyā samanvāgatau veditavyau |
T06asmahsuu:1989: acintyo hi tasyāryamārgasya pariṇāma upapattau tasmādacintyapariṇāmikī |
T06asmahsuu:1992: tayoścaikaḥ praṇidhānavaśādupapattiṃ gṛhṇāti yatheṣṭaṃ yo na vītarāgaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:1996: tau ca nirvāṇābhiratatvādubhāvapi dhandhagatikau matau ciratareṇābhisaṃbodhataḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2001: yaḥ punarasāvavītarāgo dṛṣṭasatyaḥ so 'kṛtārthaḥ śaikṣo bhavan buddharahite kāle jāto dhyānārthamudyato bhavati nirmāṇārthī |
T06asmahsuu:2002: tacca nirmāṇamāśritya krameṇa parāṃ bodhiṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsuu:2004: śrāvako bhūtvā pratyekabuddho bhavati punaśca buddha iti |
T06asmahsuu:2006: dṛṣṭasatyāvasthā[stho] yadā buddharahite kāle svayaṃ dhyānamutpādya janmakāyaṃ tyaktvā nirmāṇakāyaṃ gṛhṇāti yadā ca parāṃ bodhiṃ prāpnotīti |
T06asmahsuu:2008: vidyāsthāne pañcavidhe yogamakṛtvā sarvajñatvaṃ naiti kathaṃcitparamāryaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2009: ityanyeṣāṃ nigrahaṇānugrahaṇāya svājñārthaṃ vā tatra karotyeva sa yogam ||
T06asmahsuu:2011: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca |
T06asmahsuu:2014: bhedena punarhetuvidyāṃ śabdavidyāṃ ca paryeṣate nigrahārthamanyeṣāṃ tadanadhimuktānām |
T06asmahsuu:2018: pāramitāparipūraṇārthaṃ ye pāramitāpratisaṃyuktā evaṃ manasikārā dhātupuṣṭaye bhavanti ta etābhirgāthābhirdeśitāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2023: gotrastho bodhisattvaḥ svātmani pāramitānāṃ gotraṃ paśyan hetūpalabdhituṣṭyā pāramitādhātupuṣṭiṃ karoti |
T06asmahsuu:2025: sa hi bodhisattvaḥ svātmani pāramitānāṃ saṃniśrayabhūtaṃ bodhicittaṃ samanupaśyannevaṃ manasikaroti niyatametāḥ pāramitāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti
T06asmahsuu:2027: utpāditabodhicittasya pāramitābhiḥ svaparārthaprayoge sādharaṇaphalecchāmanasikāra, āsāṃ pāramitānāṃ parasādhāraṇaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavatvanyathā vā mā bhūdityabhisaṃskaraṇāt |

T06asmahsuu:2041: dānādivipakṣāṇāṃ ca mātsaryādīnāṃ pratideśanā, pratipakṣāṇāṃ ca dānādīnāmanumodanā,
T06asmahsuu:2044: prasādaḥ saṃpratīkṣā ca dānacchandaḥ paratra ca |
T06asmahsuu:2048: da[de]śanāmārabhya dānacchandamanasikāro dharmasyārthasya ca prakāśanārthaṃ pareṣām |
T06asmahsuu:2053: eta eva trayo manasikārā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ yojayitavyāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2058: śaktilābhe ca dānādau ṣaḍvidhe dānadāne yāvat prajñādāne |

T06asmahsuu:2077: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca pratisaṃvedanād [?]dvayoḥ || Msa_11.66 ||
T06asmahsuu:2090: āścaryaṃ cāpyanāścaryaṃ saṃjñā caiva caturvidhā || Msa_11.68 ||
T06asmahsuu:2097: yasya pratipakṣeṇa śūnyatā [di]samādhitrayaṃ dharmoddānacatuṣṭayaṃ ca deśyate |
T06asmahsuu:2102: caturvidhamanāścaryamaudarya āyatatve ca sati pāramitānāṃ buddhatvaphalābhinirvartanāt |
T06asmahsuu:2111: āśāstimanaskāraḥ sattveṣu tristhānāśaṃsanāt pāramitānāṃ bodhisattvabhūminiṣṭhāyā buddhabhūminiṣṭhāyāḥ
T06asmahsuu:2128: āyatyāṃ darśanādvṛttimanaskāro yātvā[yāṃ yāṃ] gatiṃ gatvā bodhisattvena
T06asmahsuu:2134: sarvadā bodhisattvānāṃ dhātupuṣṭau bhavanti hi || Msa_11.73 ||
T06asmahsuu:2138: savivāsā hyavivāsā tathaiva vaibhutvikī teṣām || Msa_11.74 ||
T06asmahsuu:2164: ratnasaṃjñayā durlabhārthena bhaiṣajyasaṃjñayā kleśavyādhipraśamanārthena arthasaṃjñayā avipraṇāśārthena nirvāṇasaṃjñayā sarvaduḥkhapraśamanārthena |
T06asmahsuu:2184: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpameva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpamiti |
T06asmahsuu:2188: rūpasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānamiti |
T06asmahsuu:2192: tāni bodhisattvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanupaśyatyasamanupaśyannābhiniviśate yathārthatayetyabhiprāyaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2194: pratiśaraṇamataḥ sadā prajānāṃ bhavati guṇaiḥ sa samudravatprapūrṇaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:2203: prāṇānbhogāṃśca dhīrāḥ pramuditamanasaḥ kṛcchralabdhānasārān sattvebhyo duḥkhitebhya satatamavasṛjantyuccadānaprakāraiḥ
T06asmahsuu:2204: prāgevodāradharmaṃ hitakaramasakṛtsarvathaiva prajānāṃ kṛcchre naivopalabdhaṃ bhṛśamavasṛjatāṃ vṛddhigaṃ cāvyayaṃ ca || Msa_12.1
T06asmahsuu:2205: kṛcchralabdhānapyasārān kṣayitvā[t]prāṇān bhogāṃśca bodhisattvā duḥkhitebhyaḥ kāruṇyāt satatasamudārairvisargairutsṛjanti prāgeva dharmaṃ yo naiva kṛcchreṇa vā bhṛśamapi vāvasṛjatāṃ vṛddhiṃ gacchati na kṣayaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2207: dharmo naiva ca deśito bhagavatā pratyātmavedyo yata ākṛṣṭā janatā ca yukta[yukti]vihitairdharmaiḥ svakīṃ dharmatāṃ svaśāntyāsyapuṭe viśuddhivipule sādhāraṇe 'thākṣaye
T06asmahsuu:2212: tasmānnaiva nirarthikā bhavati sā yā bhāvanā yogināṃ tasmānnaiva nirarthikā bhavati sā yā deśanā saugatī |
T06asmahsuu:2215: tasmānna nirarthikā yogināṃ bhāvanā bhavati pratyātmavedyasya dharmasya tadvaśenābhigamāt
T06asmahsuu:2216: na nirarthikā deśanā bhavati yuktivihitairdharmaiḥ svadharmatāyāṃ janatākarṣaṇāt |
T06asmahsuu:2217: yathā punarbhāvanā sārthikā bhaveddeśanā vā tat ślokārdhena darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:2231: catrubhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahādharmadānaṃ vitaranti saddharmaparigrahaṇatayā ātmanaḥ prajñottāpanatayā satpurūṣakarmakaraṇatayā saṃkleśavyavadānasaṃdeśanatayā ca |
T06asmahsuu:2236: caturthena tattvadarśikā dvividhā saṃkleśalakṣaṇasya ca tattvasya vyavadānalakṣaṇasya ca dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ satyābhyām |
T06asmahsuu:2237: madhurā madavyapetā na ca khinnā deśanāgrasattvānāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2250: adīnā madhurā sūktā pratītā viṣadā tathā [vāgjinātmaje] |
T06asmahsuu:2275: ṣaṣṭyaṅgī sācintyā yā guhyakādhipatinirdeśe buddhasya ṣaṣṭyākārā vāg nirdiṣṭā |
T06asmahsuu:2276: punaraparaṃ śāntamate tathāgatasya ṣaṣṭyākāropetā vāg niścarati snigdhā ca mṛdukā ca manojñā ca manoramā ca śuddhā ceti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2347: śuddhā trimaṇḍalena hiteyaṃ deśanā hi buddhānāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2353: eṣaiva ca deśanā punaraṣṭadoṣavivarjitā veditavyā yathākramam |
T06asmahsuu:2357: kauśīdyamanavasaṃbodhaḥ avakāśasyākaraṇaṃ anītārthatvaṃ saṃdehasyācchedanā tadvigamasyādṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ niścayaśyetyarthaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2358: khedo 'tha matsaritvaṃ doṣā hyete matā kathāyāṃ hi |
T06asmahsuu:2393: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamāṃ || Msa_12.iti |
T06asmahsuu:2395: asāre sāramataya ityavikṣepe yeṣāṃ sārabuddhiḥ pradhānabuddhirvikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2396: viparyāse ca susthitā iti nityasukhaśucyātmagrāhaviparyayeṇānityādike viparyāse susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2397: kleśena ca sa saṃkliṣṭā iti dīrghaduṣkaravyāyāmaśrameṇātyarthaṃ parikliṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2408: sukhāvatyāṃ praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropapatsyanta iti kālāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2412: rāge māne caritaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ cāniyatabhedaḥ || Msa_12.19 ||
T06asmahsuu:2416: sa hi daśavidhamanuśaṃsaṃ labhate sattvottamo dhīmān || Msa_12.21 ||
T06asmahsuu:2417: kṛtsnāṃ ca dhātupuṣṭiṃ prāmodyaṃ cottamaṃ maraṇakāle |
T06asmahsuu:2418: janma ca yathābhikāmaṃ jātismaratāṃ ca sarvatra || Msa_12.22 ||
T06asmahsuu:2420: adhimuktiṃ saha buddhyā dvayamukhatāmāśubodhiṃ ca || Msa_12.23 ||
T06asmahsuu:2425: ahameva sa tena kālena vipaśvī samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhūvamiti |
T06asmahsuu:2431: ye sukhāvatyāṃ praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropapatsyanta iti |
T06asmahsuu:2432: vimalacandraprabhasya ca tathāgatasya nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti
T06asmahsuu:2434: yatra bhagavān kvaciddānādi vivarṇayati anyatra varṇitavān |
T06asmahsuu:2438: yatra bhagavān kasyacid buddhasyādhikāṃ saṃpattiṃ varṇayati |
T06asmahsuu:2451: bhavati sukathiko hi bodhisattvastapati jane kathitairyathaiva sūryaḥ ||
T06asmahsuu:2455: pañca kāraṇāni sukathikatvasya yenāviparītaṃ darśayati abhīkṣṇaṃ nirāmiṣacitta ādeyavākyavineyānurūpaṃ ca |
T06asmahsuu:2462: yathārthamājñāya dharmamājñāya dharmānudharmapratipanno bhavati sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharmacārī tatsaṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsuu:2475: etena dvividhena pārthagjanenārthadharmajñānena dvayaṃ nairātmyabhāvaṃ pratividhya yathākramaṃ [nairātmyaṃ tathā pratividhya yathoktaṃ] tasya jñānasya pariniṣpattyarthaṃ pratipadyate |
T06asmahsuu:2481: ādibhūmau pramuditāyāṃ bhūmau samaṃ sarvairbodhisattvaistadātmabhiriti tadbhūmikairevaṃ sāmīcīpratipanno bhavati tadbhūmikabodhisattvasamatayā |
T06asmahsuu:2494: suyogo guṇavān deśo yatra dhīmān prapadyate || Msa_13.7 ||
T06asmahsuu:2503: akhinno bodhisattvaśca jñeyaḥ satpurūṣo mahān || Msa_13.8 ||
T06asmahsuu:2509: saddharmālambanatayā susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratayā śamathādinimittānāṃ kālena kālaṃ bhāvanātayā alpamātrāsaṃtuṣṭitayā satyuttarakaraṇīye sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā ca |
T06asmahsuu:2512: anena caturthena pūrvakṛtapuṇyatāṃ pañcavidhena hetutvena darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:2516: ārogyasamādhiprajñāhetutvena ca yata ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ sampadyate
T06asmahsuu:2524: tasmādrāgādidharmatāpi rāgādyākhyāṃ labhate sa ca niḥsaraṇaṃ rāgādīnāmityevaṃ tatrābhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2526: tasmātsaṃkleśanirdeśe sa saṃvid[saṃdhira] dhīmatāṃ mataḥ || Msa_13.12 ||
T06asmahsuu:2533: tāneva rāgādīnyoniśaḥ pratipadyamānastebhyo vimucyate tasmātparijñātāsta eva teṣāṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhavatītyayamatrābhisaṃdhiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2535: na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ sattvahetoḥ kathaṃcit |
T06asmahsuu:2536: śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne vividhaśubhavikalpā bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu || Msa_13.14 ||
T06asmahsuu:2537: na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti |
T06asmahsuu:2545: yathaiva citre vidhivadvicitrite natonnataṃ nāsti ca dṛśyate 'tha ca |
T06asmahsuu:2546: abhūtakalpe 'pi tathaiva sarvathā dvayaṃ sadā nāsti sa dṛśyate 'tha ca ||
T06asmahsuu:2547: yathaiva toye luti[ṭi]te prasādite na jāyate sā punaracchatānyataḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2548: malāpakarṣastu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhireṣa eva hi ||
T06asmahsuu:2549: mataṃ ca cittaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ sadā tadāgantukadoṣadūṣitaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2551: dharmābhāvaśca dharmopalabdhiśceti trāsasthānaṃ niḥsaṃkleśatā ca dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā viśuddhatā ca paścāditi trāsasthānaṃ bālānāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2556: yathā toyaṃ prakṛtyā prasannamāgantukena tu kāluṣyeṇa luti[ṭi]taṃ bhavatyevaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā
T06asmahsuu:2565: dveṣo virudyate tvasya sarvasattveṣu satpathā[sarvathā] || Msa_13.21 ||
T06asmahsuu:2567: tathāvidhāyāṃ pratigho virudhyate suteṣu tadvatsakṛpe 'pi dehiṣu ||
T06asmahsuu:2568: maitrī yataḥ pratighacittamato viruddhaṃ śāntiryato vyasanacittamato viruddhaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2569: artho yato nikṛticittamato viruddhaṃ lhādo yataḥ pratibhayaṃ na[ca] tato viruddhaṃ || Msa_13.23
T06asmahsuu:2573: kapotīmudāharati tabdahurāgatvāt apatyasnehādhimātratayā (MSA_Bagchi 87) sakṛpe bodhisattve dehiṣu sattveṣu pratigho virudhyate |
T06asmahsuu:2574: bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu maitrī bhavati vyasanaśāntiḥ arthadānaṃ lhādaśca prītyutpādāt |
T06asmahsuu:2575: yata ime maitryādayastata eva pratighacittaṃ viruddhaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2579: āture ca yathā vaidyaḥ sattveṣu pratipadyate || Msa_13.24 ||
T06asmahsuu:2581: vaṇigyathā punaḥ paṇye kāmeṣu pratipadyate || Msa_13.25 ||
T06asmahsuu:2583: pitā yathā sute bāle sattvāheṭhe prapadyate || Msa_13.26 ||
T06asmahsuu:2587: pratipattiryathā yasmin bodhisattvasya sā matā || Msa_13.28 ||
T06asmahsuu:2602: iti nirvikalpena dharma nairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteścāvikalpanā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhirveditavyā |
T06asmahsuu:2624: avadhṛtya ca tānarthāndharme saṃkalayetpunaḥ tataḥ kuryātsamāśāstiṃ tadarthādhigamāya saḥ sūtrageyādike dharme yatsūtrādināma daśabhūmikamityevamādi tatra cittaṃ prathamato badhnīyāt
T06asmahsuu:2629: tadyathānityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmyaṃ ya yoniśo na cetyādi |
T06asmahsuu:2630: anucaracittaṃ yena sūtrādīnāṃ nāmata ālambitānāṃ padaprabhedamanugacchati |
T06asmahsuu:2632: tatrārthaṃ caturbhirākārairvicārayati gaṇanayā tulanayā mīmāṃsayā pratyavekṣaṇayā ca |
T06asmahsuu:2633: tatra gaṇanā saṃgrahaṇaṃ tadyathā rūpaṃ daśāyatanānyekasya ca pradeśo vedanā ṣaḍ vedanākāyā ityevamādi |
T06asmahsuu:2641: avadhāraṇācittaṃ yena yathānucaritaṃ vicāritaṃ vā tannimittamavadhārayati |
T06asmahsuu:2642: saṃkalanacittaṃ tadyathā vicāritamarthaṃ mūlacitte saṃkṣipyaparipiṇḍitākāraṃ vartate |
T06asmahsuu:2643: āśāsticittaṃ yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati samā[dhyarthaṃ vā?] tatparipūryarthaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalārthaṃ vā bhūmipraveśārthaṃ vā viśeṣagamanārthaṃ vā
T06asmahsuu:2645: cittameva hyālambanapratibhāsaṃ vartate na cittādanyadālambanamastīti jānato vā cittamātramajānato vā cittamevālambanaṃ nānyat |
T06asmahsuu:2653: śa[sa]maprāptamupekṣeta tasminnālambane punaḥ sātatyenātha satkṛtya sarvasminyojayetpunaḥ ebhiścaturbhiḥ ślokairekādaśa manaskārā upadiṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2675: cittaṃ sthāpayati saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayatyekotīkaroti cittaṃ samādaghātīti navākārāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2676: tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2684: iti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ dhyāne iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2687: tato 'nuśaṃsāna labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān |
T06asmahsuu:2688: viśuddhibhājanatvaṃ ca tato yāti niruttaraṃ || Msa_14.19 ||
T06asmahsuu:2690: āpūryate ca praśrabdhyā kāyacittaṃ samantataḥ || Msa_14.20 ||
T06asmahsuu:2693: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā |
T06asmahsuu:2699: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasyeti daśamyāṃ bhūmau paripūrirbuddhabhūmau viśuddhiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2700: eteṣāṃ pañcānāmanuśaṃsānāṃ trayaḥ śamathapakṣā dvau vipaśyanāpakṣau veditavyau |
T06asmahsuu:2710: ānantaryasamādhiṃ ca spṛśatyāśu tadā punaḥ || Msa_14.26 ||
T06asmahsuu:2712: tathābhūto bodhisattvaḥ samāhitacitto manojalpādvinirmuktān sarvadharmānna paśyati svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇākhyānmanojalpamātrameva khyāti |
T06asmahsuu:2716: sa tasyaiva dharmālokasya vivṛdhdyarthamāsthitakriyayā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārabhate |
T06asmahsuu:2732: nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ || Msa_14.28 ||
T06asmahsuu:2741: ameyaiścāsya sā kalpaiḥ suviśuddhiṃ nigacchati || Msa_14.29 ||
T06asmahsuu:2748: dharmanairātmyena ca dharmasamatāṃ pratividhya sarvasattveṣu sadā ātmasamacittatāṃ prattilabhate
T06asmahsuu:2761: labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate || Msa_14.33 ||
T06asmahsuu:2762: tasya grāhyagrāhakābhāvasya bhāvaṃ dharmadhātūndarśanaprahātavyaiḥ kleśairvimuktaṃ paśyati
T06asmahsuu:2764: prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate || Msa_14.34 ||
T06asmahsuu:2768: tathābhāvasya śūnyatā paratantrasya sa hi na tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2774: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2777: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha bodhisattvasya sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābho veditavyaḥ smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2779: vihāya yānarthamayātmadṛṣṭiḥ mahātmadṛṣṭiṃ śrayate mahārthā || Msa_14.37
T06asmahsuu:2781: sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā ||
T06asmahsuu:2782: yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaśca gāḍhāyatabandhanena |
T06asmahsuu:2783: duḥkhasya paryantamapaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva || Msa_14.39
T06asmahsuu:2786: yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ sattveṣvakhedaśca jinātmajānāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2787: āścaryametatparamaṃ bhaveṣu na caiva sattvātmasamānabhāvāt || Msa_14.41 ||
T06asmahsuu:2792: vinātmadṛṣṭyā anarthamayyātmadṛṣṭirmahārthā yā vināpi duḥkhena svasaṃtānajena suduḥkhitā sarvasattvasaṃtānajena
T06asmahsuu:2793: yo vimuktacitto darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ parayā vimuktyānuttareṇa yānena |
T06asmahsuu:2794: baddhaśca gāḍhāyatabandhanena sarvasattvasāṃntānikena duḥkhasya paryantaṃ na paśyati sva[sattva]dhātoranantatvādākāśavat prayujyate ca duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai
T06asmahsuu:2795: sattvānāṃ karoti caiva tāma[arthaṃ] prameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2796: viparyayāttasya tu bodhisattvaḥ sa hi saṃpiṇḍitasarvasattvaduḥkhaṃ yāvallokagatamudvoḍhuṃ samarthaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2797: yā sattveṣu bodhisattvasya priyatā yā ca hitasukhaiṣitā yaśca tadarthaṃ prayogo yaścitta[yaścatat]prayuktasyākheda etatsarvamāścaryaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu |
T06asmahsuu:2812: yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena sattvānparipācayati |
T06asmahsuu:2813: asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanāmāgamyāvasānagatāmabhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate |
T06asmahsuu:2816: sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho yāvatsaṃsāramabhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ sattvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate |
T06asmahsuu:2817: kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhavenmahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2821: nigṛhya keśeṣviva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau ca balānniveśyate ||
T06asmahsuu:2823: mahāndhakāraṃ vidhamayya bhāsate jaganmahāditya ivātyudārataḥ || Msa_14.49
T06asmahsuu:2825: yo hi dharmamukhaśrotasyavavādaṃ labhate tasya nityaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:2832: yān varjyāsevya yoge bhavati vipulatā saugate śāsane 'smim || Msa_14.50 ||
T06asmahsuu:2839: iti satataśubhācayaprapūrṇaḥ suvipulametya sa cetasaḥ samādhiṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2845: uddānam adhimukterbahulatā dharmaparyeṣṭideśane pratipattistathā samyagavavādānuśāsanaṃ || upāyasahitakarmavibhāge catvāraḥ ślokāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2847: tathaiva dānādiśubhasya sarvato budheṣu karma trividhaṃ nirucyate ||
T06asmahsuu:2853: na kāyavākcittamayasya karmaṇo jinātmajānāṃ bhavatīha saṃnatiḥ || Msa_15.3
T06asmahsuu:2859: viṣādisādharmyaṃ hīnayānapratisaṃyuktasya karmaṇo hīnayānacittapariṇāmanāt mahāyāne kuśalamūlasamucchedanāt anutpannakuśalamūlānutpādāya |
T06asmahsuu:2863: na karmiṇaḥ karma na karmaṇaḥ kriyāṃ sadāvikalpaḥ samudīkṣate tridhā |
T06asmahsuu:2865: anena ślokena caturthena viśuddhyupāyaṃ karmaṇo darśayati |
T06asmahsuu:2873: prabhedanaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ vipakṣo jñeyo guṇo 'nyonyaviniścayaśca || Msa_16.1
T06asmahsuu:2886: ityabhyudayaḥ tatra cāsaṃkleśamaviparītakṛtyārambhaṃ cādhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā vyavasthitāḥ
T06asmahsuu:2890: sattvārtheṣu samyakprayukto bodhisattvastisṛbhirdānaśīlakṣāntipāramitābhiryathākramaṃ tyāgenānupaghātenopaghātamarṣaṇena ca sattvārthaṃ kurute |
T06asmahsuu:2891: tisṛbhiḥ sanidānatayā [sanidānayā] cittasthityā vimuktyā ca sarvaprakāramātmārthaṃ carati
T06asmahsuu:2896: āvarjanaiḥ sulapitaiḥ parārtha ātmārthaṃ etasmāt || Msa_16.4 ||
T06asmahsuu:2911: kṣāntyā vīryeṇa cākhedo dvaye yathākramaṃ duḥkhe ca sattvāsattvakṛte kuśalaprayoge ca |
T06asmahsuu:2913: etāvacca samasta [mahāyānam iti?] mahāyānasaṃgrahādhikārāt ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2924: śikṣātrayamadhikṛtya ca ṣaṣṭ pāramitā jinaiḥ samākhyātāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:2927: tatrādyā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā tisraḥ pāramitāḥ sasaṃbhārasaparivāragrahaṇāt |
T06asmahsuu:2928: dānena hi bhoganirapekṣaḥ śīlaṃ samādatte samāttaṃ ca kṣāntyā rakṣatyākruṣṭāpratyākrośanādibhiḥ
T06asmahsuu:2929: dvidhetyadhicittamadhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣā sā antena dvayena saṃgṛhītā yathākramaṃ dhyānena prajñayā ca |
T06asmahsuu:2933: dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsuu:2938: nirvikalpajñānasahagataṃ dharma nairātmyaprativedhayogāt sarvecchāparipūrakaṃ yo yadicchati tasmai tasya dānāt |
T06asmahsuu:2939: sattvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena sattvān saṃgṛhya triṣu yāneṣu yathābhavyaniyojanāt |
T06asmahsuu:2941: śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsuu:2945: vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsuu:2947: dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsuu:2949: prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsuu:2952: eṣāṃ tu vipakṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ krodhaḥ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepo dauṣprajñyaṃ yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:2961: bhoganirapekṣo hi śīlaṃ samātte śīlavān kṣamo bhavati kṣamāvān vīryamārabhate ārabdhavīryaḥ samādhimutpādayati samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06asmahsuu:2963: hīnaṃ hi dānamutkṛṣṭaṃ śīlamevaṃ yāvaddhīnaṃ dhyānamutkṛṣṭā prajñeti |
T06asmahsuu:2980: upāyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca sarvāsāmeva kathyate || Msa_16.16 ||
T06asmahsuu:2983: tatropadhisaṃniśritā caturākārā hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ
T06asmahsuu:2993: atṛptāśayena vipulāśayena muditāśayena upakārāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca |
T06asmahsuu:2999: yathā caikasya sattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayitavyastamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayet |
T06asmahsuu:3002: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati |
T06asmahsuu:3004: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśaya iti |
T06asmahsuu:3006: na tveva te satvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti |
T06asmahsuu:3007: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:3011: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakārāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:3012: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā
T06asmahsuu:3016: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ satveṣvabhinandati nātmanaḥ |

T06asmahsuu:4498: yena yanniśritya yo 'saṃkleśa iti trividhamasaṃkleśāṅgaṃ veditavyam |
T06asmahsuu:4506: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśastena tadarthāvabodhāt |
T06asmahsuu:4509: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ hi kālam akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati |
T06asmahsuu:4511: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamaṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante |
T06asmahsuu:4516: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayādyathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā |
T06asmahsuu:4519: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇamākāṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt |
T06asmahsuu:4521: ākāṅkṣedbhikṣuraho vatāhaṃ viviktaṃ kāmairiti vistareṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāveva dvau dharmau
T06asmahsuu:4527: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hyasaṃskṛte || Msa_18.67 ||
T06asmahsuu:4529: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ || Msa_18.68 ||
T06asmahsuu:4530: ityupaniṣanmatetyevamādinā śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4538: tadeva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayitavyaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4543: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ || Msa_18.69 ||
T06asmahsuu:4550: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu me jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanānumodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā |
T06asmahsuu:4554: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāmasamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalamityayaṃ prabhedaḥ
T06asmahsuu:4558: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ || Msa_18.71 ||
T06asmahsuu:4562: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca || Msa_18.73 ||
T06asmahsuu:4563: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4572: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānām aśuddhabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu |
T06asmahsuu:4573: pariśuddhabhūmikā tvadhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ityayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4576: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat |
T06asmahsuu:4578: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat |
T06asmahsuu:4582: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataśca paridīpitaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4592: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4606: trividhaśca grāhyasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4607: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4622: tatra sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ityapraṇihitasya samādherūpaniṣadbhāvena deśitaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4633: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpita ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tvastīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:4641: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamiti paścādvacanadiyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā |
T06asmahsuu:4646: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4648: naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4651: tadyadi bhūtvā punaruttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4653: na ca tattenaiva hetunā bhavitumarhati tasyopayu[bhu]ktahetukatvāt |
T06asmahsuu:4656: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4657: athāpyevamiṣyeta notpannaṃ punarutpadyate yadarthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syādutpannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścānnirudhyate notpannamātrameveti |
T06asmahsuu:4668: māyopamāste bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikāstāvatkālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti |
T06asmahsuu:4670: te hi saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti |
T06asmahsuu:4671: anyathā hi teṣāmapi nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syuryathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyatāṃ
T06asmahsuu:4672: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayameva vā tiṣṭhetsvayameva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ
T06asmahsuu:4682: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścādvinaśyati agnimeva śyāmateti |
T06asmahsuu:4688: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatirvisadṛśī gṛhyate na tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4697: athāpi syātpratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattau tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāditi |
T06asmahsuu:4705: tadyadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhavedādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta |
T06asmahsuu:4706: tasmādādita evānyathātvamārabdhaṃ yatkrameṇābhivardhamānamante vyaktimāpadyate kṣīrasyeva dadyavasthāyāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4715: kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāścakṣurūpādayo hetutaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4717: na tvakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitumarhati yathā nityādanityamiti |
T06asmahsuu:4721: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāścakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmurchanāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ
T06asmahsuu:4725: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti |
T06asmahsuu:4729: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante |
T06asmahsuu:4731: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇamadhimucyate tadapyasya tathaiva (MSA_Bagchi 145) syāditi |
T06asmahsuu:4734: tathā hi pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti |
T06asmahsuu:4738: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt |
T06asmahsuu:4739: evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitam |
T06asmahsuu:4740: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4760: hīnatvena viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau [sugatau?] cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4761: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu paranirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ cittamātrādhīnatvāt
T06asmahsuu:4768: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyāmutpattāvādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumānaviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇairveditavyam |
T06asmahsuu:4770: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt taduttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtteruttarottaraviśeṣo (MSA_Bagchi 146) nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt |
T06asmahsuu:4774: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinānyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet |
T06asmahsuu:4779: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4781: na hi tiṣṭhatyāśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4782: yāne tiṣṭhati tadārūḍhānavasthānavadanyathā hyāśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet |
T06asmahsuu:4786: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāvavināśe satyante vikārābhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:4787: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau |
T06asmahsuu:4788: na hi tathāsthiteṣveva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syādutpattiḥ sugatau vā |
T06asmahsuu:4795: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatirnāma kācit kriyā yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4796: sā hyutpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayedanutpannā vā |
T06asmahsuu:4797: yadyutpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcidgata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate |
T06asmahsuu:4798: athānutpannā tenāsatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4799: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4803: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārādanyopalabhyate |
T06asmahsuu:4812: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyostiryaggamanamagnerūrdhvaṃ jvalanamapāṃ nimne syandanaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4817: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvamantareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasminkāle punarbījabhāvo yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4819: na ca śakyaṃ (MSA_Bagchi 147) pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvamabhyupagantuṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4828: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ || Msa_18.89 ||
T06asmahsuu:4837: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍivadhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate |
T06asmahsuu:4848: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle |
T06asmahsuu:4856: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇamanyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt |
T06asmahsuu:4859: na hi tejasyutpanne tejaḥ sahotpannamindhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate |
T06asmahsuu:4860: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4863: śabdaḥ punaryo 'pi kālāntaramupalabhyate ghaṇṭādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ
T06asmahsuu:4865: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhameva cittānuvṛtteryathā pūrvamuktaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4867: pṛcchrayate khalvapi sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati (MSA_Bagchi 148) kathaṃ kṛtvā |
T06asmahsuu:4871: yadyevaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇamanya[nitya]tvasyāgrahaṇāditi sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4878: dvividhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca |
T06asmahsuu:4879: tadyadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyamabhipretamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4880: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaurvā goriti |
T06asmahsuu:4881: atha vṛttivailakṣaṇyamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt |
T06asmahsuu:4886: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:4887: yadyevaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avasthānamiti
T06asmahsuu:4889: | na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatteriti |
T06asmahsuu:4890: yadyevaṃ vadet sati kṣaṇikattve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmātpradīpādiva kṣaṇiakatvaṃ na siddhamiti |
T06asmahsuu:4894: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāttadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punarvyavadānamityevaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4896: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
T06asmahsuu:4904: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavātpratyayo na saḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4905: nairarthakyādato draṣṭā yāvanmoktā na yujyate || Msa_18.96 ||
T06asmahsuu:4908: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā || Msa_18.97 ||
T06asmahsuu:4912: darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate || Msa_18.99 ||
T06asmahsuu:4916: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca || Msa_18.101 ||
T06asmahsuu:4920: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā || Msa_18.103 ||
T06asmahsuu:4923: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
T06asmahsuu:4924: yataśca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4928: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat |
T06asmahsuu:4930: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:4932: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānamupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdho bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:4933: na sa evamupalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:4935: viparyāsāt tathā hyanātmanyātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā |
T06asmahsuu:4939: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hyeṣa saṃkleśo yaduta ahaṃ mameti |
T06asmahsuu:4942: na[sa] caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4945: yatra punarvastuni rūpādisaṃjñakeprajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmātkimekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvidanyetvena |
T06asmahsuu:4953: ekatve hi skandhānāmātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasattvaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4958: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanamatikramya pudgalasya dravyato 'stitvamicchanti ta idaṃ syurvacanīyāḥ
T06asmahsuu:4967: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnirhi nāma tejodhāturindhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni |
T06asmahsuu:4969: loke ca vināpyagninā dṛṣṭamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi vināpi cendhanenāgniriti siddhamanyatvaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4972: upalabdhestathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūramapi jvalatparaiti |
T06asmahsuu:4977: astyeva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvadvijñātā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā ca |
T06asmahsuu:4980: sa hi darśānādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā |
T06asmahsuu:4985: na hi tasya tatra kiṃcitsāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:4987: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavannani[bhavanni]ṣṭaṃ vijñānamanityaṃ na pravartayet |
T06asmahsuu:5008: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvadvijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhavenniṣprayatno vā
T06asmahsuu:5009: saprayatnasya vā punarasau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrvā bhavedākasmikaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5012: tasmādeva ca doṣatrayādvakṣyamāṇāt tadyatnapratyayatvaṃ ca neti vartate |
T06asmahsuu:5013: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:5015: ityasati vyāpāre pudgalasya darśanādau kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati |
T06asmahsuu:5020: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni |
T06asmahsuu:5021: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudgalaḥ karteti kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati yāvadvijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācitprayatno na syādanityo na syāt |
T06asmahsuu:5022: nitye ca prayatne darśanādīnāṃ yugapacca nityaṃ ca pravṛttiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5027: tasya tathā sthitasya pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate |
T06asmahsuu:5029: sati hi tatpratyayatve na kadācitpudgalo nāstīti |
T06asmahsuu:5030: kimarthaṃ prāk prayatno na syādyadā notpannaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5033: tṛtīyaśca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yanna sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syāditi |
T06asmahsuu:5038: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca ||
T06asmahsuu:5039: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāmasti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhānpratisaṃdadhāti anyatra dharmasaṃketāditi deśitaṃ |
T06asmahsuu:5043: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate |
T06asmahsuu:5046: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5047: parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ityasati dravyato 'stitve kasmāddeśitaḥ
T06asmahsuu:5051: pudgalaprajñaptimantareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaśca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5052: tatra parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ
T06asmahsuu:5056: tayorvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa parijñātāvibhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ
T06asmahsuu:5058: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ
T06asmahsuu:5059: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ityayamatra nayo veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsuu:5061: na hi tāvadasāvātmadṛṣṭyutpādanārthaṃ yujyate yasmāt ātmadṛṣṭiranūtpādyā pūrvamevotpannatvāt
T06asmahsuu:5064: evaṃ sati syāt ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānāmātmadarśanaṃ vidyate
T06asmahsuu:5067: na hi pūrvamātmānamanātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścidātmato gṛhṇāti |
T06asmahsuu:5069: pūrvamagṛhītvā paścādgṛhṇātīti yathāpūrvaṃ tathā paścādapi mokṣo na syāt |
T06asmahsuu:5070: sati cātmanyavaśyamahaṃkāramamakārābhyāmātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiśca tannidānaiḥ kleśairbhavitavyamiti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt |

T06asmahsuu:5973: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te || Msa_20.56 ||
T06asmahsuu:5974: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataśca paridīpitā |
T06asmahsuu:5975: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaṭkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ityevamādi
T06asmahsuu:5990: nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ |
T06asmahsuu:5999: sarvatra sarvasattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te || Msa_20.58 ||
T06asmahsuu:6000: anena tribhiśca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānācca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā |
T06asmahsuu:6002: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punaratra sarvasattvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭam |
T06asmahsuu:6005: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te || Msa_20.59 ||
T06asmahsuu:6026: nānālokadhātuṣu dṛśyamānatā nirmāṇakāyena parṣanmaṇḍaleṣvapi dṛśyamānatā sāṃbhogikena kāyena
